    • Method Detail

      • create

        public boolean create​(java.lang.String solutionName,
                      int userId,
                      int problemId,
                      java.lang.String language,
                      byte[] solution)
               throws AlreadyExistsException,
                      NullInputException,
                      InvalidDataException,
                      DoesNotExistException
        creates a solution in the database
        Parameters:
        solutionName - the name of the problem
        userId - the id of the user that made the problem
        problemId - the id of the problem the solution is for
        language - the language the solution is written in
        solution - the solution itself
        Returns:
        Boolean success value based on successful insertion
        Throws:
        AlreadyExistsException - a solution with that name already exists
        NullInputException - an input is null when it should not have been
        InvalidDataException - invalid data was given to the function
        DoesNotExistException - the user or problem does not exist

      • update

        public boolean update​(int solutionId,
                      java.lang.String solutionName,
                      int userId,
                      int problemId,
                      java.lang.String language,
                      int score,
                      byte[] solution)
               throws DoesNotExistException,
                      AlreadyExistsException,
                      NullInputException,
                      InvalidDataException
        updates a solution in the database
        Parameters:
        solutionId - the id of the solution to change
        solutionName - the name of the problem
        userId - the id of the user that made the problem
        problemId - the id of the problem the solution is for
        language - the language the solution is written in
        score - the score that the solution recieved
        solution - the solution itself
        Returns:
        Boolean success value based on successful insertion
        Throws:
        AlreadyExistsException - a solution with that name already exists
        NullInputException - an input is null when it should not have been
        InvalidDataException - invalid data was given to the function
        DoesNotExistException - the user, problem, or solution does not exist
